title: Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Nearby Attractions            Nearby Attractions          Â   Looking for places to stop on your way to and from Sleeping Bear Dunes? There's plenty to do in Northwestern Michigan. Use the links to area chambers of commerce to find information about private campgrounds, hotels, restaurants, shops, and other recreational activities.
